cards.name: Auregold
cards.description: Auregold is an epic desert-dwelling pokemon, cloaked in shimmering golden armor. It stands tall and proud in the arid environment, surveying its surroundings with a piercing gaze. Its days are spent slowly traversing the desert, searching for sustenance and new experiences. Its Combustion and Smolder abilities keep it safe from harm, while its beautiful golden armor protects it from the harsh sun.
cards.image_prompt: Auregold::0 a epic fire-type pokemon::2.5, wearing golden armor, in a desert environment, lava texture background, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
